item.title: How To Level Up Destruction Skill Fast In Oblivion Remastered
item.description:
Destruction is one of the most popular schools of magic in The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, since it's the spellcasting branch that delivers the most hurt using powerful elemental spells that can wreak havoc on the battlefield. Destruction magic is essential to some starting Classes like the Witchhunter, the Spellblade, and the Mage.

And if players want to unlock the most powerful spells in the Destruction School, they need to level it up to Master Rank. But to reach this level is not a small task, so this guide will offer players some insight on how to speed up this process a lot.

How To Level Up Destruction Fast In Oblivion Remastered

One of the easiest ways to level up Destruction in Oblivion Remastered , is to grab lots of Magicka Recovery potions , which can be crafted by combining Flax Seeds (found in central Cyrodiil, especially near Skingrad) and Blackberries (found in Inns, grocery stores), and an Apprentice-level Spell like Flare, then finding enemies like Conjurers, who can summon skeletons endlessly.

Skeletons can be used as target practice and are pretty easy to defeat, and the Flare spell consumes a lot of Magicka and grants lots of experience each time it hits a ' valid target .' There's yet another trick to this: To wear Heavy Armor, since it reduces Spell-Efficiency, making the Flare spell cost even more. And since the game treats magicka consumed per spell as experience value, this will also increase the amount of experience earned.

Adding the effects of the Major Skill, if players picked Destruction as one of their starter skills, be it through a custom class or one of the many spellcasting classes available, this will be doubled. So, players can effectively level up from 10-25 to 75 in Destruction without too many issues.

Now for the last 25 levels (75 to 100) players will want to get loads of Welkynd Stones which can be obtained quite easily using the duplication glitch. Then, they need to search for a Journeyman or Expert-level Destruction Fire spell that consumes 120+ Magicka. Travel to an Oblivion Gate and watch the nearby area for Fire Attronachs. Players need to use the fire spells repeatedly in the Atronachs, since they are immune to Fire, and farm as much experience as they want. They will be at Master Level in no time.

Best Places To Farm Destruction Skill Experience

The following list has some good spots for players to practice their Destruction spells endlessly, while they earn loads of experience without too much risk.

  • Fort Caractacus , located on the northern shore of Lake Rumare. It has several Conjurer enemies inside, but watch out for the Invisible Rats and Wolves that are part of the Zero Visibility Quest.
  • Oblivion Gates, any one will be good, as long as players keep in mind that scamps and fire atronachs are the ideal targets for endless farming, since they resist fire. There's one North of Skingrad that players can spot easily when completing the Mage's Guild Recommendation Quest.
  • Belda , an Ayleid ruin located on the road between the Imperial City and Cheydinhall. It has several Conjurer enemies, which summon Scamps and Skeletons. Good for Journeyman to Expert farming.
  • Sage Glen Hollow , located northeast of Bravil. A cave full of Conjurers, Zombies, and Skeletons. Great place to farm at any level.

item.title: CoD Black Ops 6 & Warzone: All Season 3 Ranked Play Rewards
item.description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Warzone bring a thrilling collection of exclusive rewards for competitive players diving into Ranked Play, enhancing the competitive grind with unique incentives and fresh challenges.

Staying true to tradition, these rewards are tailored to recognize both skill and dedication across Ranked modes – whether you’re battling it out in Multiplayer or climbing the ladder in Battle Royale. They give players the chance to proudly display their rank and accomplishments. With that in mind, here’s a full breakdown of all the Ranked Play Season 3 rewards available in Black Ops 6 and Warzone .

How To Earn Ranked Play Rewards In Black Ops 6 & Warzone

To earn Ranked Play rewards in Black Ops 6 Multiplayer and Warzone Battle Royale, players must actively compete in Ranked mode across both titles, earning wins, gaining Skill Rating, and climbing the ranks. However, before gaining access to the competitive mode, players must first prove themselves by meeting specific requirements:

  • Win 50 matchmade multiplayer games, and/or
  • Place in the Top 15 in 30 Warzone matches .

This system ensures that only committed and skilled players enter the competitive scene. Each Ranked Play season features a unique set of rewards tied to a player’s rank, including Large Decals , Camos , Calling Cards , and Weapon Blueprints, each styled to reflect their respective tiers. To qualify for any seasonal rewards, players must reach at least Silver rank , which serves as the minimum threshold for eligibility.

Black Ops 6 Season 3 Ranked Play Rewards

As with past seasons, Black Ops 6 Ranked Play in Season 3 continues to reward competitive players with exclusive cosmetic items based on their performance. These rewards include charms , stickers , camos , calling cards , emblems , and more, each themed around the player’s final rank in Ranked mode. To unlock these rewards, players must showcase their skills in competitive matches, climb the ranks , and complete seasonal challenges designed specifically for Ranked Play participants.

Check out all the Ranked Play Season 3 rewards for BO6 Multiplayer below:

Reward

How To Get

Pro Issue – AMES 85 Weapon Blueprint

Get 10 Wins

100 Season 3 Wins – Large Decal

Get 25 Eliminations

Ranked Season 3 Silver – Calling Card

Reach Silver Rank in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Gold – Calling Card and Camo

Reach Gold Rank in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Platinum – Calling Card and Camo

Reach Platinum Rank in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Diamond – Calling Card and Camo

Reach Diamond Rank in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Crimson – Calling Card and Camo

Reach Crimson Rank in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Iridescent – Calling Card and Camo

Reach Iridescent Rank in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Top 250 – Calling Card and Camo

Finish the Top 250 in Ranked Season 3

Ranked Season 3 Top 250 Champion – Calling Card and Camo

Reach Top 250 #1 Overall Rank in Ranked Season 3

Additionally, competitive players will receive a Weapon Blueprint for the Jackal PDW for each rank (starting with Gold) they achieved during Season 3 of Black Ops 6 Ranked Play. Here's how to get them:

  • Gold: Start in/above or reach Gold at any point in Season 3.
  • Platinum: Start in/above or reach Platinum at any point in Season 3.
  • Diamond: Start in/above or reach Diamond at any point in Season 3.
  • Crimson: Start in/above or reach Crimson at any point in Season 3.
  • Iridescent: Start in/above or reach Iridescent at any point in Season 3.
  • Top 250: Finish Season 3 in the Top 250.

Warzone Season 3 Ranked Play Rewards

Warzone Ranked Play Season 3 offers a wide range of rewards to celebrate the highly anticipated return of Verdansk. These include weapon charms, stickers, camos, calling cards, and other cosmetics inspired by the competitive mode. Players can earn these exclusive items by climbing the ranks by earning SR (skill rating), allowing them to showcase their skill in the ranked experience.

Take a look at all Warzone 's Ranked Play Season 3 rewards available:

How To Get

Crownbreaker – Weapon Sticker

Get 5 Eliminations

Ranked Renegade – Weapon Camo

item.title: Witcher 4 Might Not Feature Fan Favorite Character
item.description:
Summary

  • Denise Gough is unsure if Yennefer will return in The Witcher 4, potentially leading to her absence or a less significant role.
  • CD Projekt Red is developing The Witcher 4 with Ciri as the main character, but the release date remains unknown.
  • Only Ciri and Geralt have been confirmed to be returning in The Witcher 4 so far.

Denise Gough, the actor behind Yennefer’s voice in The Witcher 3 , has recently stated that she does not know whether the character will return in The Witcher 4 . Yennefer of Vengerberg is a popular character with the fandom of both the games and the books, so it would be disappointing for some people if she does not appear in the upcoming The Witcher 4 .

CD Projekt Red is currently developing The Witcher 4 with a team of over 400 developers, and the game still does not have an official release date. Despite gamers not expecting the title's release before 2027, The Witcher 4 revealed Ciri as its main character last year. It’s already known that the story will be set after the events of The Witcher 3 , but not much more has been revealed since then.

Now, Denise Gough was interviewed by Eurogamer and revealed that she did not know whether the character would return to The Witcher 4 or not. Yennefer is an important character in The Witcher 3 , helping Geralt during his journey and serving as a romance option. The sorcerer originally appeared in the books, which are set before the trilogy of games, and is a beloved character by the fanbase due to her abrasive but unique and fun personality.

Yennefer's Voice Actor Doesn't Know If The Character Will be Back in The Witcher 4

Gough’s response may indicate at least three different outcomes: either Yennefer will not be a part of the game, her appearance will not be as significant as in the previous title, or she may return but with a different voice actor. While Jo Wyatt played Ciri in The Witcher 3 , for example, Ciara Berkeley will be the voice of Ciri in The Witcher 4 . So, the same may happen with Yennefer.

Until now, only Ciri and Geralt have been confirmed to appear in The Witcher 4 . Soon after the game unveiled its first trailer, the developers confirmed that Geralt will appear in the new entry, but the story will be much more focused on his adopted daughter.

Unfortunately, the developers have not revealed many details about the future of the Witcher series. Last year, CDPR addressed romances in The Witcher 4 , confirming that the title will have them and that the team wants to ensure that they will offer a meaningful narrative experience. As usual, however, gamers will still need to wait before they can learn additional details about this and many other aspects of the eagerly awaited game.

item.title: Fortnite: How to Get the Free First Order Stormtrooper Skin
item.description:
With May the Fourth just around the corner, Fortnite is once again joining forces (no pun intended) with Star Wars . Epic Games is bringing an array of Star Wars -related quests, skins, and weapons to the Battle Royale, and this time around, that's not all - Chapter 6 Season 3 is going to be all about Star Wars , so players can expect a themed Battle Pass as well as all sorts of named locations and landmarks.

However, before Chapter 6 Season 3 even had a chance to drop, Fortnite decided to get fans ready so they could start the season in style with a free Star Wars skin. This guide tells players how they can get the First Order Stormtrooper skin in Fortnite .

How to Get the Free First Order Stormtrooper Skin in Fortnite

To promote May the Fourth and the upcoming Star Wars season, also known as Galactic Battle, in Fortnite , Epic Games is giving away a free Stormtrooper skin.

In order to get the free Star Wars skin in Fortnite , players need to connect their Epic Games account with a MyDisney account. Once they've done this, the next time that they log into Fortnite , they will be greeted with the free First Order Stormtrooper skin . Here is how the First Order Stormtrooper skin and its LEGO variant look in Fortnite :

How to Connect Epic Games to MyDisney

As mentioned above, players must connect their Epic Games account to a MyDisney account in order to get the First Order Stormtrooper skin for free in Fortnite .

To connect an Epic Games account with a MyDisney account, players must log into the Epic Games website, click on their username on the top right corner of the screen, and select Account. Next, they must select the Apps & Accounts tab, and then Connect below the MyDisney logo .

Here, they'll have to either log into their MyDisney account or create a new one, which only requires an email, a date of birth, and a password. Once they've connected the accounts, the skin will appear in their in-game locker the next time players log into Fortnite .

This promotional offer is available for limited time only. Gamers have until August 31, 2025, to connect their Epic Games and MyDisney accounts in order to receive the First Order Stormtrooper skin for free in Fortnite . However, since skins are not exclusive in Fortnite , it may return to the Item Shop at a later date.

item.title: Donkey Kong Bananza Handheld Performance Confirmed
item.description:
Summary

  • Donkey Kong Bananza is confirmed to run at 1080p 60 FPS with HDR in handheld mode on the Switch 2.
  • The game is set to launch on July 17, 2025, exclusively for the Switch 2.
  • Fans eagerly anticipate the series' first 3D-platforming adventure in over 25 years.

Looking to take advantage of the improved hardware capabilities of the Nintendo Switch 2, Donkey Kong Bananza has been confirmed to perform at 1080p 60 FPS with HDR in handheld mode. Donkey Kong Bananza is set to launch exclusively for the Switch 2, and audiences now have a better idea of the graphics and performance expectations for the title ahead of its release.

First revealed during the April 2 Nintendo Switch 2 Direct, Donkey Kong Bananza will be the latest 3D-platforming Donkey Kong game, with the first and only other such title being Donkey Kong 64 for the Nintendo 64. With Donkey Kong fans already voicing their enthusiasm for the title, some players may be happy to learn about how the game will run in handheld mode for the Nintendo Switch 2.

According to the Japanese digital edition of the Nintendo Magazine 2025 Special Issue, Donkey Kong Bananza will run at 1080p resolution and 60 FPS with HDR in handheld mode. Previous launch titles for the original Nintendo Switch did not always take advantage of that console's full performance abilities, so some may be surprised to see a Nintendo Switch 2 launch title already set to utilize the improved capabilities of the new hardware. It should be noted that the details on Donkey Kong Bananza 's resolution and frame rate are stated as simply being the maximum output with no specifications on stability, so it remains to be seen if the 1080p 60FPS graphics will be consistent. There was also no mention of the docked performance of Donkey Kong Bananza , which the April 2 Direct revealed to be higher than handheld mode across titles.

When Does Donkey Kong Bananza Release?

  • July 17, 2025

Donkey Kong Bananza is slated to launch for the Nintendo Switch 2 on Thursday, July 17, and will be one of the newest first-party Nintendo video games. The title will not only be the second-ever 3D Donkey Kong game but will also be the first new entry in the series since Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze originally launched for the Wii U back in 2014. As such, it should come as no surprise that audience hype for Donkey Kong Bananza is already soaring high, and that excitement may climb further as more details are revealed.

The Donkey Kong game franchise remains a pillar of the cultural zeitgeist, with the old arcade cabinets from the 1980s still just as popular today, and fans young and old enthusiastic as ever for the next entry starring the iconic ape. Interested players can stay tuned for more updates on Donkey Kong Bananza and other Nintendo Switch 2 titles ahead of the new console's release on June 5.
